hero.greetingTooltip: Barka dey na nufin 'Sannu' a cikin harshen Hausa, yaren asalina.
hero.name: Mahamadou Gremah
hero.description: Ni …óalibi ne …óan Najar mai sha'awar kimiyyar kwamfuta. A halin yanzu ina cikin shekara ta 2 a karatun kimiyya da fasaha …ìangaren injiniyan yanar gizo da tsaron bayanai a Faculty of Sciences of Monastir a Tunisiya. Wanda ya kafa GremahTech, kamfani ne na farako wanda ya ∆ôware a ha…ìaka manhajar yanar gizo da wayar hannu a garin Damagaram.
